intro: PLAY YOUR STORY. STEP INTO THE GRIND WITH RUGBY LEAGUE RAW!
description:
THE FIRST RUGBY LEAGUE GAME ON NINTENDO SWITCH! TOUGH HITS, RAW SPEED, AND NO LIMITS… THIS IS FOOTY AT FULL THROTTLE.

SWITCH FIRST: Take hard-hitting Rugby League anywhere, anytime.
CAREER MODE: Build a powerhouse squad, rise through the ranks, fight for glory every season.
BE A PRO: Strap on the boots and carve your own brutal path to greatness.
FANHUB: Create and customise players and teams, then unleash them online.
GAME MODES: From quick clashes to full comps, or go head-to-head in fierce 8-player online battles.
COMMENTARY: AI-driven commentary that hits as hard as the tackles.
